entry.title: ABOUT ME
entry.content:
Hey there! 👋

I'm Pavitran , and welcome to my little corner of the internet!

I'm currently learning how to build websites using Gridea, and this is my first site. I'm using it to explore, experiment, and share a bit about myself.



function hello{}(
  Short quote of the day : "Take it day by day — good things are coming."
)

Meme Corner !

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

🌱 A Few Things About Me:

  • I enjoy coding and exploring computer techs.
  • I'm learning about Gridea, a simple website maker.
  • I created this site to practice and have fun with tech.

🛠️ Tools I'm Using:

  • Gridea for writing and publishing
  • Markdown for writing content
  • GitHub Pages to host my site

📫 Get in Touch:

Feel free to reach out or follow me on:

  • Linkedin
  • GitHub
  • Email

Thanks for visiting!

entry.title: WEBSITE BASICS
entry.content:
BASICS

H2

H3

H4

H5

####### H6

italic = italic
bold = bold
bold italic = bold italic

listing

  • item 1
  • item 2
    • 1a subitem
    • 2a subitem

ordered list

  1. first item
  2. first
    1. subitem
    2. subitem

links
gridea
https://github.com/

images

code block

function hello{}(
    console.lpg("Hello World")
)

horizontal line

or

tables

header 1 header 2
row 1 data
row 2 data

check boxes

-[] task 1
-[x] task 2
